title: Law School is OVER: BARBRI 2014 Bar Exam Set, Complete Audio and
description:
This torrent contains the *complete* BARBRI lecture series for the MBE, MEE, and MPT for the 2014 and 2015 exams. Included are all the lectures, in audio and video format, including all the PDF lecture notes that were included.  Also included are sample MBE questions, Sample MEE questions, and sample MPT questions, all in PDF format.

Let me apologize in advance: I did the best I could. This torrent does not contain any state-specific materials, nor does it contain any *MBE* materials for Federal Civ Pro, which will start in the Feb 2015 exam. Other than those two caveats, you have absolutely everything here to pass any bar exam in the nation.

If I'm able to procure Civ Pro lectures and outlines for the MBE, I'll definitely add it as a separate torrent and provide a link here.

The following lectures are included:

MBE TOPICS:

Constitutional Law
Contracts
Crim
Crim Pro
Evidence
Real Prop
Torts (2 sep. profs. One does not provide lecture notes)

MEE TOPICS:

Agency & Partnerships
Commercial Paper
Conflict of Laws
Corporations
Family Law (Same prof as torts: Does not provide lecture notes)
Federal Civil Procedure
Secured Transactions
Trusts
Wills

OTHER:

Various MPT and MEE workshops (complete)

Good luck, everyone! Please leave feedback re the torrent, tell me what law school you're representing, and please a message when you pass!
